10  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.customizer;
11  
12  import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
13  import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
14  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
15  
16  import javax.swing.JComponent;
17  import javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent;
18  import javax.swing.event.ChangeListener;
19  
20  import org.netbeans.api.project.Project;
21  import org.netbeans.api.project.ProjectUtils;
22  import org.netbeans.modules.maven.api.NbMavenProject;
23  import org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.support.ProjectCustomizer;
24  import org.netbeans.spi.project.ui.support.ProjectCustomizer.Category;
25  import org.openide.util.ImageUtilities;
26  import org.openide.util.Lookup;
27  import org.openide.util.NbBundle;
28  import org.openide.util.WeakListeners;
29  
30  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.Icons;
31  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.ExternalFormatterPanel;
32  
33  @NbBundle.Messages({ "LBL_Config=External Formatting" })
34  @ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registrations({
35  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-j2ee-clientproject", position = 1000),
36  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-j2ee-ejbjarproject", position = 1000),
37  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-java-j2seproject", position = 1000),
38  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-j2ee-ejbjarproject", position = 1000),
39  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-ant-freeform", position = 1000),
40  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-web-project", position = 1000),
41  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-maven/" + NbMavenProject.TYPE_OSGI, position = 1000),
42  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-maven", position = 1000),
43  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-gradle", position = 1000),
44  		@ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider.Registration(category = "Formatting", projectType = "org-netbeans-modules-apisupport-project", position = 1000)
45  })
46  public class ExternalFormatterCustomizerTab implements ProjectCustomizer.CompositeCategoryProvider {
47  	@Override
48  	public Category createCategory(Lookup lkp) {
49  		return ProjectCustomizer.Category.create("external-format", Bundle.LBL_Config(), ImageUtilities.loadImage(Icons.EXTERNAL_FORMATTER_ICON_PATH, false));
50  	}
51  
52  	@Override
53  	public JComponent createComponent(final Category category, final Lookup lkp) {
54  		Preferences projectPreferences = ProjectUtils.getPreferences(lkp.lookup(Project.class), ExternalFormatterPanel.class, true);
55  		final ExternalFormatterPanel configPanel = new ExternalFormatterPanel(projectPreferences, true);
56  		final ProjectSpecificSettingsPanelr/ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel.html#ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel">ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel projectSpecificSettingsPanel = new ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel(configPanel, projectPreferences);
57  		configPanel.load();
58  		projectSpecificSettingsPanel.load();
59  
60  		category.setStoreListener(new ActionListener() {
61  			@Override
62  			public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
63  				projectSpecificSettingsPanel.store();
64  				configPanel.store();
65  			}
66  		});
67  
68  		ValidationListener listener = new ValidationListener(category, projectSpecificSettingsPanel);
69  		configPanel.addChangeListener(WeakListeners.change(listener, configPanel));
70  		projectSpecificSettingsPanel.addChangeListener(WeakListeners.change(listener, projectSpecificSettingsPanel));
71  		return projectSpecificSettingsPanel;
72  	}
73  
74  	private static class ValidationListener implements ChangeListener {
75  		private final Category category;
76  
77  		private final ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel projectSpecificPanel;
78  
79  		private ValidationListener(Category category, ProjectSpecificSettingsPanel projectSpecificPanel) {
80  			this.category = category;
81  			this.projectSpecificPanel = projectSpecificPanel;
82  		}
83  
84  		@Override
85  		public void stateChanged(ChangeEvent e) {
86  			category.setValid(projectSpecificPanel.valid());
87  		}
88  	}
89  }
